meaningMnemonic: When <kanji>sunlight</kanji> shines on a <kanji>scene</kanji>, it’s still a <vocabulary>scene</vocabulary>. The sunlight is here to create some drama, also making this a <vocabulary>spectacle</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
